name: Summon Dragons 2
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure in Summon Dragons 2, the ultimate dragon-themed RPG game that takes you on a journey from a secluded ocean plot to becoming a legendary Dragonlord.

Build your island, construct powerful buildings, summon mighty dragons, and recruit skilled dragon trainers as you explore numerous dungeons and instances, each requiring strategic line-ups and tactics.
